package-manager.name: depot
package-manager.title: GNU test suite framework
package-manager.description: DejaGnu is a framework for testing other programs. Its purpose is to provide a single front end for all tests. DejaGnu is written in Expect, which in turn uses Tcl -- Tool command language.
